title: S&P 500 Poised for First Two‑Week Loss Since June as Silver Tops $100 | The Close 1/23/2026
description: Bloomberg Television brings you the latest news and analysis leading up to the final minutes and seconds before and after the closing bell on Wall Street. Today's guests are Wealth Enhancement’s Ayako Yoshioka, Mizuho Securities’ Nick Setyan, Apple Former Executive Tony Fadell, Bessemer Trust’s Jeff Mills, Richard Bernstein Advisors’s Richard Bernstein, Zellerfeld’s Cornelius Schmitt, Candle Media’s Kevin Mayer, The Record Academy’s Harvey Mason Jr. (Source: Bloomberg)
